values.value:
Extract structured data fields from this permit application document. Return data in JSON format with the following key-value pairs:
**REQUIRED FIELDS TO EXTRACT:** - applicant_name: Full legal name of the applicant/operator - applicant_contact: Phone number and email address - permit_type: Type of permit requested (drilling, environmental, building, etc.) - location_description: Detailed location description - coordinates: Latitude/longitude coordinates if present - legal_description: Section, township, range, or other legal land description - project_description: Brief description of proposed activities - start_date: Proposed start date for activities - duration: Expected duration of project - permit_number: Any existing permit or application numbers referenced - regulatory_references: Any CFR, regulation, or code sections mentioned - environmental_considerations: Environmental factors or assessments mentioned - mitigation_measures: Any proposed mitigation or protection measures - contact_info: Primary contact person for this application - signature_date: Date of signature on application - notary_info: Notary information if document is notarized
**FORMAT REQUIREMENTS:** - Use consistent date format: YYYY-MM-DD - For coordinates use decimal degrees format - For phone numbers use standard format: (XXX) XXX-XXXX - Extract exact text, don't interpret or modify - If information is not present, use null for the value - Include confidence level (0-1) for each extracted field
**SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS:** - Pay attention to checkbox selections and form field values - Look for handwritten additions or corrections - Note any missing required information - Identify document quality issues that might affect accuracy
